script.name: plugin.st.ex.local.menu
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = 1907 $menu.settings = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='st.ex.menu.settings' $menu.data = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='st.ex.menu.data' $current.data = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='st.ex.current' $owned.data = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='st.ex.owned'
if not $owned.data $owned.data = table alloc $a.obj ->set local variable: name='st.ex.owned' value=$owned.data end
if $a.event == [MEvent.Start] if not $menu.settings $menu.settings = table alloc $a.obj ->set local variable: name='st.ex.menu.settings' value=$menu.settings end $menu.data = table alloc $a.obj ->set local variable: name='st.ex.menu.data' value=$menu.data set global variable: name='st.ex.current' value=$a.obj $is.first = [TRUE] if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_WARE $menu.data['current.ware'] = $a.data gosub sub.BuildSellMenu return $input end gosub sub.BuildMenu return $input
else if $a.event == [MEvent.TradeBarCh] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'st.ex.buy' OR $menu.id == 'st.ex.sell' do if $value < 0 $value = 0 $menu.data['current.amt'] = $value end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Switch] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'st.ex.menu' if $value $menu.settings[$selection] = $value else remove key $selection from table $menu.settings end gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Returned] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'st.ex.buy' if $selection == 'shares.buy.confirm' if $value == [Button.Yes] $ware = $menu.data['current.ware'] $current.amt = $menu.data['current.amt'] $price = $current.data[3][$ware] $total = $price * $current.amt $money = get player money if $total > $money START speak text: page=[Page.MiscVoice] id=1254 priority=60 else gosub sub.CheckOwnedData gosub sub.DoBuyReport $amt = $owned.data[$ware][0] $amt = $amt + $current.amt $owned.data[$ware][0] = $amt $amt = $owned.data[$ware][1] $amt = $amt + $total $owned.data[$ware][1] = $amt $amt = $owned.data[$ware][2] if $amt $amt = ( $amt + $price ) / 2 else $amt = $price end $owned.data[$ware][2] = $amt $amt = $owned.data[$ware][3] inc $amt = $owned.data[$ware][3] = $amt remove player money: $total, transaction object=[PLAYERSHIP], page=$page.id, textid=762, null, null, null, null, null end $input = create menu return to previous menu: value=$ware return $input end end else if $menu.id == 'st.ex.sell' if $selection == 'shares.sell.confirm' if $value == [Button.Yes] $ware = $menu.data['current.ware'] $current.amt = $menu.data['current.amt'] $price = $current.data[3][$ware] $total = $price * $current.amt gosub sub.ComputeCommision $total = $total - $commision $owned.price = $owned.data[$ware][2] $profit = $total - ( $owned.price * $current.amt ) gosub sub.DoSellReport $this.owner = $a.obj -> get owner race do if $profit > 0 add trade rank based on profit: race=$this.owner profit=$profit add player money: $total, transaction object=[PLAYERSHIP], page=$page.id, textid=762, null, null, null, null, null $amt = $owned.data[$ware][0] $amt = $amt - $current.amt if $amt <= 0 $owned.data[$ware][0] = 0 $owned.data[$ware][1] = 0 $owned.data[$ware][2] = 0 else $owned.data[$ware][0] = $amt $amt = $owned.data[$ware][1] $price = $owned.data[$ware][2] $amt = $amt - ( $price * $current.amt ) $owned.data[$ware][1] = $amt end $amt = $owned.data[$ware][3] inc $amt = $owned.data[$ware][3] = $amt
$input = create menu return to previous menu: value=$ware return $input end end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.NextInput] if is datatype[ $a.data ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $selection = $a.data[0] $value = $a.data[1] else $selection = $a.data end if $selection == 'shares.buy' $ware = $menu.data['current.ware'] $amt = $current.data[3][$ware] do if $amt < 0 $amt = 0 $total = $value * $amt $total = convert number $total to string $text = convert number $value to string $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=816, $text, $total, null, null, null $text = read text: page=$page.id id=739 $input = create input: id='shares.buy.confirm', message box=$read.text, title=$text, buttons=[Buttons.YesNo], icon=7, default button=[Button.Yes] return $input else if $selection == 'shares.sell' $ware = $menu.data['current.ware'] $amt = $current.data[3][$ware] $total = $value * $amt do if $amt < 0 $amt = 0 gosub sub.ComputeCommision $total = $total - $commision $total = convert number $total to string $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=818, $total, null, null, null, null $text = read text: page=$page.id id=740 $input = create input: id='shares.sell.confirm', message box=$read.text, title=$text, buttons=[Buttons.YesNo], icon=53, default button=[Button.Yes] return $input end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Context] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'st.ex.menu' if $selection == 'ware.context' $ware = $value[1] $value = $value[0]
if $value == 'info' $input = create input: id='ware.info' encyclopedia page, ware=$ware return $input else if $value == 'buy' $menu.data['current.ware'] = $ware $menu.data['current.amt'] = 1 gosub sub.BuildBuyMenu return $input else if $value == 'sell' $menu.data['current.ware'] = $ware $menu.data['current.amt'] = 1 gosub sub.BuildSellMenu return $input end end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Update] $menu.id = $a.data[0] if $menu.id == 'st.ex.menu' gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu else if $menu.id == 'st.ex.buy' gosub sub.BuildBuyMenu return $menu else if $menu.id == 'st.ex.sell' gosub sub.BuildSellMenu return $menu end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Group] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'st.ex.menu' if $value remove key $selection from table $menu.settings else $menu.settings[$selection] = [TRUE] end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Finished] $a.obj ->set local variable: name='st.ex.menu.data' value=null set global variable: name='st.ex.current' value=null end
return null
sub.BuildMenu: $local.sector = $a.obj -> get sector $this.owner = $a.obj -> get owner race $clusted.sectors = get cluster sectors for race $this.owner, startsector: $local.sector, threshold: 2, only include known: [TRUE]
$menu = create custom menu array
* display info at top $player.name = get player name $text = get full amount of credits in player account formatted as string: include separators [TRUE], use millions suffix for very large numbers [TRUE] $text = sprintf: fmt='%s: %s', $player.name, $text, null, null, null add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text
$is.open = $menu.settings['sectors'] if not $is.open $is.open = [TRUE] else $is.open = [FALSE] end $local.sectors.count = size of array $clusted.sectors $text = sprintf: fmt='%s [%s]', $local.sector, $local.sectors.count, null, null, null add new grouping to menu: $menu, text=$text, open=$is.open, id='sectors', indent=20
$i = 0 while $i < $local.sectors.count $text = $clusted.sectors[$i] add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text inc $i = end add end grouping to menu: $menu
gosub sub.GetOptions
$COLUMN.SUPPLY = 160 $COLUMN.WIDTH = 67 $COLUMN.WIDTH.TREND = 90 $COLUMN.WIDTH.TOTAL = 110
$total.shares = 0 $total.profit = 0 $total.invested = split large number into array: number=0
$text.columns = array alloc: size=11 $col.width = $COLUMN.SUPPLY - 5 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=703 $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=$col.width right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text.col $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=729 $col.pos = $COLUMN.SUPPLY $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[1] = $text.col $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=730 $col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[2] = $text.col $col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=706 $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[3] = $text.col $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=707 $col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[4] = $text.col
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=738 $col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH.TREND right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[5] = $text.col $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=708 $col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH.TREND $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[6] = $text.col $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=711 $col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[7] = $text.col $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=754 $col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH $text.columns[8] = $text.col $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=755 $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH $text.columns[9] = $text.col $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=732 $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[10] = $text.col
if $current.data add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.columns
$values = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102302 $values[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102301 $values[1] = $read.text $default = $menu.settings['show.owned'] skip if $default $default = 0 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=911 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$values, default=$default, return id='show.owned', width=120 allowtabs=[FALSE] add section to custom menu: $menu
$array.wares = $current.data[0] $table.products = $current.data[1] $table.resources = $current.data[2] $table.price = $current.data[3] $table.trend = $current.data[4]
$types = create new array, size=8, elements=[SSTYPE_LASER], [SSTYPE_MISSILE], [SSTYPE_SHIELD], [SSTYPE_W_BIO], [SSTYPE_W_ENERGY], [SSTYPE_W_FOOD], [SSTYPE_W_MINERALS], [SSTYPE_W_TECH] $types.size = size of array $types $j = 0 while $j < $types.size $waretype = $types[$j] inc $j =
$is.open = $menu.settings[$waretype] if not $is.open $is.open = [TRUE] else $is.open = [FALSE] end
if $is.first $open.type = $options['open.local'] if $open.type == 1 $is.open = [TRUE] remove key $waretype from table $menu.settings else if $open.type == 2 $is.open = [FALSE] $menu.settings[$waretype] = [TRUE] end end
if $waretype == [SSTYPE_SHIELD] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=13 else if $waretype == [SSTYPE_LASER] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=11 else if $waretype == [SSTYPE_MISSILE] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=12 else if $waretype == [SSTYPE_W_BIO] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=8 else if $waretype == [SSTYPE_W_FOOD] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=9 else if $waretype == [SSTYPE_W_ENERGY] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=14 else if $waretype == [SSTYPE_W_MINERALS] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=15 else if $waretype == [SSTYPE_W_TECH] $read.text = read text: page=54 id=16 else $read.text = read text: page=54 id=17 end add new grouping to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, open=$is.open, id=$waretype, indent=2
$done = 0 $i = 0 $size = size of array $array.wares while $i < $size $ware = $array.wares[$i] inc $i =
skip if has $ware been discovered continue
$maintype = get maintype of ware $ware skip if $maintype == $waretype continue
if $menu.settings['show.owned'] $owned.ware = $owned.data[$ware] skip if $owned.ware continue skip if $owned.ware[0] continue end
gosub sub.DrawWare inc $done = end
if not $done $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text end add end grouping to menu: $menu add section to custom menu: $menu end end
add section to custom menu: $menu $text.columns = array alloc: size=3 $col.pos = $COLUMN.SUPPLY + $COLUMN.WIDTH.TREND + ( $COLUMN.WIDTH * 4 ) $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=720 $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$COLUMN.WIDTH length=$col.pos right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text.col $amt = $total.shares gosub sub.FormatNumberWithNull $col.pos = $COLUMN.SUPPLY + $COLUMN.WIDTH.TREND + ( $COLUMN.WIDTH * 6 ) $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[1] = $text.col $amt = $total.profit gosub sub.FormatCreditWithNull gosub sub.FormatValueColour $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[2] = $text.col add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text.columns
$text.columns = array alloc: size=2 $col.pos = $COLUMN.SUPPLY + $COLUMN.WIDTH.TREND + ( $COLUMN.WIDTH * 4 ) $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=736 $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$COLUMN.WIDTH length=$col.pos right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.columns[0] = $text.col $large.billion = $total.invested[0] $large.unit = $total.invested[1] if $large.billion OR $large.unit $text = format large number pair as string: billions $large.billion, units $large.unit, include separators [TRUE], use millions suffix for very large numbers [TRUE] else $text = read text: page=$page.id id=715 end $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=$COLUMN.WIDTH.TOTAL right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[1] = $text.col add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text.columns
set menu option: $menu, remove main header=[TRUE] set menu option: $menu, widthtype=[MenuWidth.Huge] set menu option: $menu, icon=121 set menu option: $menu, page up/down keys for info=[FALSE]
$callback = [Callback.Group] | [Callback.Switch] $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=719 $input = create input: id='st.ex.menu', dynamic menu=$menu, title=$read.text, description=$local.sector, callback=$callback, update=1000ms endsub
sub.DrawWare: $text.columns = array alloc: size=11 $col.width = $COLUMN.SUPPLY - 5 $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=$col.width right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$ware $text.columns[0] = $text.col $amt = $table.products[$ware] gosub sub.FormatNumber $col.pos = $COLUMN.SUPPLY $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[1] = $text.col
$col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH $amt = $table.resources[$ware] gosub sub.FormatNumber $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[2] = $text.col
$col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH $amt = get min price of ware $ware gosub sub.FormatNumber $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[3] = $text.col
$col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH $amt = get max price of ware $ware gosub sub.FormatNumber $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[4] = $text.col
$col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH $text = $table.trend[$ware] $amt = $table.price[$ware] @ $text = [THIS] -> call script plugin.st.ex.formattrend : Trend Array=$text Current=$amt $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH.TREND right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[5] = $text.col
$amt = $table.price[$ware] gosub sub.FormatNumber $current.price = $amt $col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH.TREND $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[6] = $text.col
if $owned.data[$ware] $amt = $owned.data[$ware][2] else $amt = null end gosub sub.FormatNumberWithNull $owned.price = $amt $col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[7] = $text.col
if $owned.data[$ware] $amt = $owned.data[$ware][0] else $amt = null end gosub sub.FormatNumberWithNull $owned.shares = $amt $total.shares = $total.shares + $owned.shares $col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[8] = $text.col
$col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH gosub sub.ComputeAvailable $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=$col.pos length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[9] = $text.col
$total = $owned.shares * $current.price gosub sub.ComputeCommision $total = $total - $commision
$large.number = split large number into array: number=$total $total.invested = add large number arrays: $total.invested, $large.number, null, null, null
$amt = $total - ( $owned.shares * $owned.price ) $total.profit = $total.profit + $amt gosub sub.FormatCreditWithNull gosub sub.FormatValueColour $col.pos = $col.pos + $COLUMN.WIDTH $text.col = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=$COLUMN.WIDTH right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.columns[10] = $text.col
gosub sub.BuildWareContext $ret = create menu return value: context menu, id='ware.context', menu=$context.menu, dynamic=[FALSE] add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.columns returnvalue=$ret endsub
sub.FormatCredits: skip if $amt $amt = 0 $text = convert number $amt to string $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=716, $text, null, null, null, null do if $amt < 0 gosub sub.FormatValueColour endsub
sub.FormatValueColour: if $amt > 0 $text = strip colour codes: $text $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=21, $text, null, null, null, null else if $amt < 0 $text = strip colour codes: $text $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=22, $text, null, null, null, null end endsub
sub.FormatNumber: skip if $amt $amt = 0 $text = convert number $amt to string endsub
sub.FormatCreditWithNull: if not $amt $text = read text: page=$page.id id=715 else $text = convert number $amt to string $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=716, $text, null, null, null, null do if $amt < 0 gosub sub.FormatValueColour end skip if $amt $amt = 0 endsub
sub.FormatNumberWithNull: if not $amt $text = read text: page=$page.id id=715 else $text = convert number $amt to string end skip if $amt $amt = 0 endsub
sub.BuildWareContext: $context.menu = create context menu $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=812 $ret = create new array, arguments='info', $ware, null, null, null add context menu entry: menu=$context.menu, text=$read.text, icon=29, returnvalue=$ret, hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] add context menu separator: menu=$context.menu $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=739 $ret = create new array, arguments='buy', $ware, null, null, null if $availble.shares > 0 add context menu entry: menu=$context.menu, text=$read.text, icon=7, returnvalue=$ret, hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] else add context menu entry: menu=$context.menu, text=$read.text, icon=7, returnvalue=$ret, hotkey=null, disabled=[TRUE] end $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=740 $ret = create new array, arguments='sell', $ware, null, null, null if $owned.shares > 0 add context menu entry: menu=$context.menu, text=$read.text, icon=53, returnvalue=$ret, hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] else add context menu entry: menu=$context.menu, text=$read.text, icon=53, returnvalue=$ret, hotkey=null, disabled=[TRUE] end $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=818 add context menu global info line: menu=$context.menu, name=$read.text, value=$ware $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1100006 $text = convert number $availble.shares to string add context menu global info line: menu=$context.menu, name=$read.text, value=$text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=9601 $text = convert number $owned.shares to string add context menu global info line: menu=$context.menu, name=$read.text, value=$text endsub
sub.DrawTopInfo: $player.name = get player name $text = get full amount of credits in player account formatted as string: include separators [TRUE], use millions suffix for very large numbers [TRUE] $text = sprintf: fmt='%s: %s', $player.name, $text, null, null, null add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text add info line section to menu: $menu
$owned.shares = 0 $owned.price = 0 if $owned.data[$ware] $owned.shares = $owned.data[$ware][0] $owned.price = $owned.data[$ware][2] end $table.products = $current.data[1] gosub sub.ComputeAvailable $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=741 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text
$table.price = $current.data[3] $amt = $table.price[$ware] gosub sub.FormatCredits $current.price = $amt $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=744 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text
add info line section to menu: $menu
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=743 $amt = $owned.shares gosub sub.FormatNumberWithNull $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=745 $amt = $owned.price gosub sub.FormatCreditWithNull $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text
set menu option: $menu, remove main header=[TRUE] endsub
sub.ComputeAvailable: $amt = $table.products[$ware] if $amt > 0 $amt = ( $amt * 2 ) - $owned.shares end gosub sub.FormatNumber $availble.shares = $amt endsub
sub.CheckOwnedData: $owned.ware = $owned.data[$ware] if not $owned.ware $owned.ware = array alloc: size=4 $owned.ware[0] = 0 $owned.ware[1] = 0 $owned.ware[2] = 0 $owned.ware[3] = 0 $owned.data[$ware] = $owned.ware end endsub
sub.BuildBuyMenu: $ware = $menu.data['current.ware'] $current.amt = $menu.data['current.amt'] skip if $current.amt $current.amt = 0
$menu = create custom menu array gosub sub.DrawTopInfo
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=739 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text $ret = create menu return value: next input, id='nextinput', value='shares.buy' $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=803 add trade bar to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, min=1, max=$availble.shares, current=$current.amt, volume=1, used=0, return value=$ret, left text=null, right text='%CURRENT%' add section to custom menu: $menu $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=746 $amt = $current.amt gosub sub.FormatNumber $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text
$amt = $table.price[$ware] if $amt $amt = $amt * $current.amt end gosub sub.FormatCredits $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=747 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text
set menu option: $menu, icon=7 set menu option: $menu, maximum menu height=20 lines
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=739 $input = create input: id='st.ex.buy', dynamic menu=$menu, title=$read.text, description=$a.obj, callback=[Callback.TradeBarCh], update=1000ms endsub
sub.ComputeCommision: $this.owner = $a.obj -> get owner race $noto = get notoriety from race $this.owner to race Player $noto = get notoriety level: amount=$noto $noto = 10 - $noto $commision = ( $total * 5 ) / 100 $commision.max = ( $total * 15 ) / 100 $commision = linear interpolation: x1=0, x2=15, y1=$commision, y2=$commision.max, value=$noto endsub
sub.BuildSellMenu: $ware = $menu.data['current.ware'] $current.amt = $menu.data['current.amt'] skip if $current.amt $current.amt = 0
$menu = create custom menu array gosub sub.DrawTopInfo
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=740 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text $ret = create menu return value: next input, id='nextinput', value='shares.sell' $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=805 add trade bar to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, min=1, max=$owned.shares, current=$current.amt, volume=1, used=0, return value=$ret, left text=null, right text='%CURRENT%' add section to custom menu: $menu $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=746 $amt = $current.amt gosub sub.FormatNumber $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text
$amt = $table.price[$ware] if $amt $amt = $amt * $current.amt end gosub sub.FormatCredits $total = $amt $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=747 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text
add section to custom menu: $menu
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=748 gosub sub.ComputeCommision $amt = - $commision gosub sub.FormatCredits $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=749 $amt = $total - $commision gosub sub.FormatCredits $total.cost = $amt $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text
add section to custom menu: $menu $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=750 $amt = $total.cost - ( $current.amt * $current.price ) gosub sub.FormatCredits $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text
set menu option: $menu, icon=53 set menu option: $menu, maximum menu height=26 lines $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=739 $input = create input: id='st.ex.sell', dynamic menu=$menu, title=$read.text, description=$a.obj, callback=[Callback.TradeBarCh], update=1000ms
endsub
sub.GetOptions: $options = get global variable: name='st.ex.opt' if not $options $options = table alloc end endsub
sub.DoBuyReport: gosub sub.GetOptions if $options['report.local'] $commision = 0 $profit = 0 gosub sub.DoReport $array[0] = 1 end endsub
sub.DoSellReport: gosub sub.GetOptions if $options['report.local'] gosub sub.DoReport $array[0] = 2 end endsub
sub.DoReport: gosub sub.CreateReports if $options['report.local'] set stock exchange commodity reports menu item: Enabled=[TRUE] $array = create new array, size=8, elements=1, $a.obj, $ware, $current.amt, $price, $commision, $profit, $total $now = playing time $report.table[$now] = $array end endsub
sub.CreateReports: gosub sub.GetOptions if $options['report.local'] $report.table = get global variable: name='st.ex.report' if not $report.table $report.table = table alloc set global variable: name='st.ex.report' value=$report.table end end endsub return null
